title: Alice Smart System ???-Net: A Physics-Driven Electronic Lifeform
description:
A complete implementation of the ?-Net (Gamma-Net) architecture: a physics-driven electronic lifeform that models cognition, emotion, pain, sleep, language emergence, and psychopathology through impedance-mismatch equations derived from coaxial transmission line theory.

Core Equation

All behavior derives from a single unified reflection coefficient:

?(f) = (Z_brain(f) ??Z_body(f)) / (Z_brain(f) + Z_body(f))

where impedance mismatch drives error signals that cascade through the entire system ??pain is protocol collapse (|?| ??1.0), learning is impedance matching (|?| ??0), and emotion is the instantaneous reflection energy.

v3.0.0 Highlights

  • Dimensional Cost Irreducibility Theorem ??A = A_imp(t) + A_cut, where A_cut is invariant under all local impedance update rules at fixed topology
  • Heterogeneous ?-topology ??nodes with different mode counts K ??{1,2,3,5}, spontaneous sprouting/pruning
  • Soft-cutoff fractal control ??p(?K) = (?K + 1)^{-Î³} continuously tunes K-space fractal dimension
  • Scaling law ???_conv ~ N^{??.05}, larger networks converge faster (mean-field effect)

Architecture

  • Full-body simulation ??eye (FFT retina), ear (cochlea basilar membrane), hand (grasp impedance), mouth (formant synthesis)
  • 26+ brain modules ??thalamus, amygdala, hippocampus, prefrontal cortex, Broca/Wernicke areas, basal ganglia, etc.
  • Closed-loop life cycle ??perceive ??error ??compensate ??re-perceive
  • Sleep physics ??NREM/REM 90-min ultradian cycles with offline memory consolidation
  • Clinical neurology ??phantom limb pain, PTSD, aphasia, neglect syndrome emerge from the physics
